items.text: Android-Lollipop (api 21) introduce a new API : PdfRenderer
items.href: java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow

items.text:
get a seekable file descriptor from your pdf document :
  ParcelFileDescriptor fd = ParcelFileDescriptor.open(file, ParcelFileDescriptor.MODE_READ_ONLY)
items.href: java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow

items.text: get a seekable file descriptor from your pdf document :
items.href: java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow

items.text:
create the PdfRenderer
  PdfRenderer renderer = new PdfRenderer(fd);
items.href: java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow
java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow

items.text:
prepare the Bitmap
  Bitmap bitmap = Bitmap.createBitmap(WIDTH, HEIGHT, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_4444);
items.href: java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow
java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow

items.text:
get the PdfRenderer.Page to render
  PdfRenderer.Page page = renderer.openPage(pageIndex);
items.href: java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow
java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow

items.text:
render the page on the prepared bitmap
  page.render(bitmap, null, null, PdfRenderer.Page.RENDER_MODE_FOR_DISPLAY);
items.href: java - How to render PDF in Android - Stack Overflow
